Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Neilian Drive, south of a small shopping complex.
Room.LongDescription: To the north is one of the numerous recycling plants in Oceancrest. Most of the junk that people can't use gets pulverized and then re-used as something else. There are a number of shops in the center to the north. The entrance to these shops is on the other side of the building along Ministry Way or Riverdell Way, to the east or west respectively.
